column4: anyone tried that latest fglrx 9.3 and been able to get it to suspend properly?
i think ati got a better linux support
I have had nothing but issue with my ATI card on my laptop.
and my Nvidia on my desktop has been smooth as silk
ati dont want to support the old cards
did you say that you installed fglrx 9.3 on Jaunty?
no, not really, i use SiS
what the? i got direct screen rendering and 3d things
I'm jealous, how about suspend? does it work
in intrepid, but not in jaunty
I guess, free has its price.
I agree, I'm sticking with nix.
